name: com.unitymcp.server
description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Unity Editor. Enables AI assistants and LLMs to interact with Unity projects programmatically through a standardized JSON-RPC 2.0 interface.

samples.description: Demonstration client (Python) for connecting to the Unity MCP Server. Not part of the main server implementation.
Demonstration client (Node.js) for connecting to the Unity MCP Server. Not part of the main server implementation.
